title: 336A.10 IMMUNITY.
text:
(a) Except as provided in sections 609.87 to 609.891, the state, the secretary of state, counties, county recorders, and their employees and agents are immune from liability as a result of errors or omissions in information supplied under this chapter.
(b) The secretary of state, county recorders, and their employees and agents are not liable for any loss or damages arising from errors in or omissions from information entered into the computerized filing system as a result of the electronic transmission of effective financing statements and lien notices.
